alert.note: Alert for Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland Liberty; Inland McIntosh; Long (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 7:11PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LIBERTY, MCINTOSH AND LONG COUNTIES... At 711 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Townsend, or near Tibet, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Darien, Tibet, Jones, McIntosh, Midway, Riceboro, Wolf Island and Harris Neck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland Liberty; Inland McIntosh; Long
